mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter from C. M. Stigleman to his Mother
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated January 13, 1862, to “My dear Mother” from C. M. Stigleman sent from “Camp near Union Mills.” 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
